title: Blog Under Construction
text: Oh hi there! What good winds brought you to this corner of the internet? Well, awkard moment, because I broke my site 😅. Therefore, blog under construction 😁 Will be back very soon!

title: Hi there, I’m Amalia
text: I’m a Data Scientist who likes to work with data and Machine Learning. I am part of the innovation team at Sixense Satellite, a company based in Barcelona that uses remote sensing data for monitoring motion and stability.

title: About
text:
Welcome to my corner of the internet! This blog is my digital canvas, a place where I share my musings, discoveries, and where I keep some of my notes on a variety of topics.
If you find anything here that resonates with you or that piques your interest, don’t hesitate to reach out! 😊

title: 📚🖋 Notes
text: Here lies a sort of “second brain”: a collection of frequently referenced notes and insights that escape my memory. It’s inspired by Hamel’s blog, serving as a digital repository for myself and anyone who might find it useful. If you notice any inaccuracies, feel free to submit a pull request or get in touch.
